name: Scribbleman Army (alpha)
description:
Scribbleman army Do you like watching tons of units working for you?
  • Scout new areas in a dark cave.
  • Craft tons of units to help you collect resources.
  • Create new buildings and unlock new recipes.
  • Grow your scribbleman army and be ready to fight monsters.

Play time: ~3h-6h
Controls: Mouse and keyboard / configurable / by default, move with WASD or mouse right click.
Recommendation: Download the game and play on Windows. If you play on the browser, your save may be deleted by Itch.io every time the game is updated. Also, the game is slower on browser.

Scribbleman Army is currently in development and will be available on Steam when officially released. The developer has not tested the game beyond level 13, it would be better to wait for the release before going further.

Sharing your feedback about the game would help me a lot! 🧡

FAQ
  • I am stuck in the game, what can I do?"Some buildings are only available from other specific buildings, have you checked them all? 
    Also, higher level units can bring you new resources.
    Finally, if you have reached the level 14, it may be a bug."

  • Can I save my game?
    "Absolutely, press Escape key, and click on 'Save' or 'Save and quit' but if you play on the browser, every time the game is updated your save may be deleted by Itch.io."

  • Can I go back to a previous floor I built on?
    "Yes, you can go back to any level from the base building and find your previous buildings! Don't be afraid to go deeper."

  • What happens to my units when I change floors?
    "They follow you wherever you go! Don't be afraid to go deeper ;)"

  • How can I help the developer?
    "Leave a comment and tell me what you thought about the game! :)"
